name: Transmit Home
description:
Global Game Jam 2018  

 Disaster has struck! 

Your space station is losing power and life support is failing!

You are unable to send a transmission back home to earth with such minimal power, so you have to activate the emergency transmission system. 

Its not safe for personnel to explore the station so you have take control of your engineer robot and locate each power source.

They are located in numerous areas of the ship and you must pay attention to your sensor to seek them out.

You need to hurry though, the crew don't have much time left!

IMPORTANT - Requires an xbox mapped dual shock controller. InputMapper can re-map Ps4 controllers to play this game.
